pathAssistantSteps.info: Great work, this Case is now Resolved! Go back to the queue and grab another!

With this Case now Escalated, be sure to take the following steps:

  1. Note the Priority. Are you giving it the appropriate attention?
  2. Understand the issue(s) being raised by reviewing the Case Description.
  3. What product is the customer having an issue with? Please research cause.
  4. Document all findings under the Engineering Req Number.
  5. Re-calculate Potential Liability to determine if it is correct. If not, please correct.

Within this Case, be sure to take the following steps:

  1. Note the Priority. Are you giving it the appropriate attention?
  2. What is the case about? Read through the Subject and Description to understand.
  3. Based on the Subject and Description, determine if the Case Reason is correct. If not, please correct it.

As you begin to work the Case, be sure to take the following steps:

  1. Note the Priority. Are you giving it the appropriate attention?
  2. What product is the customer having an issue with? Is there a known issue with that product? If so, Escalate to Engineering.
  3. If this Case needs to be escalated, be sure to locate and add the Engineering Req Number.
  4. Based on the issue, calculate the Potential Liability.
